description:
Sora comes down with the flu. Kaede and Mii-kun are desperate to help, but his strong sense of independence makes him a little difficult to care for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It`s Scary When Someone You Care About Gets Sick
Taisetsu na Hito ga Kaze o Hiitara Totemo Shinpai
たいせつなひとが風ぜをひいたらとてもしんぱい
소중한 사람이 감기에 걸리면 너무 걱정돼
